    • listSubtraction

      public static List<Resource> listSubtraction​(List<Resource> a, List<Resource> b)
      list A - list B (UNSAFE!!, dosnt check if A hase more resource then B) if that happen quantity is setted to 0 to avoid infinite loop used only in cli resource insertion/extraction to check if he completed the payment
      Parameters:
      a - op1
      b - op2
      Returns:
      a list with subtracted qwuantity
